title: Emerging investigator series: Preferential adsorption and coprecipitation of permafrost organic matter with poorly crystalline iron minerals

Future permafrost thaw will likely lead to substantial release of greenhouse gases due to thawing of previously unavailable organic carbon (OC). Accurate predictions of this release are limited by poor...
